title: A sea of clouds
caption: A sea of clouds
desc: This breathtaking scene on the Spanish island of Tenerife is known as the ‘mar de nubes’, or sea of clouds and is an atmospheric phenomenon that is very common in the Canary Islands.  It forms when cool, humid trade winds arriving from the north east cannot rise due to hot, dry air from the south, hanging above the island.
